explanation: [0-0] Outside a house at night, a man in a green hat and blue overalls is knocking on the door. The man is holding a blond child wearing yellow clothes and black and white shoes in his left hand, and the child is holding a red bag. On the steps in front of the door is a pumpkin lantern, and in front of the pumpkin lantern is a skeleton dog.
